overview_of_class: This class examines the economics of government taxation and expenditure policies. Topics covered include externalities and public goods, programs that target the poor such as Medicaid and social insurance programs such as Social Security and Medicare. We also investigate the impact of income taxation on labor supply and savings, and discuss the general theory of social insurance, the U.S. health care system, and health care reform.
name: Elements of Public Finance
subject: ECON
